A1-B2.rationale: Both points discuss the lack of generalization across different tasks or contexts. Review A focuses on the limited experimental scope involving only one task, while Review B questions the applicability of findings to other datasets and tasks.

A2-B1.rationale: Both points address a limited focus. A2 discusses the narrow focus on MLM loss without downstream tasks, whereas B1 highlights the research's limitation to transformer and MLM objectives, suggesting a broader scope could be beneficial.
